languages.text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ascended{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}screened{/g} ally, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon damage to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, −1 stack is spent.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Eagle will defend the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Screened{/g} ally from {uip|2PERBonus|09793f5510a840f1858079051560828e} attacks in total, dealing its weapon damage after each attack.
This effect works only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.
languages.original_text: Когда киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, всякий раз когда враг атакует союзника-{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманку{/g}, киберорел наносит этому врагу урон от оружия. При срабатывании союзник теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

traits.locale_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ascended{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}screened{/g} ally, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon damage to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, −1 stack is spent.

If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

languages.text: Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmişse{/g} bir düşman {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}yem{/g} etkisindeki bir dost birime saldırdığında bu etkinin her bir birikimi, siber kartalın saldırgana kendi silah {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} kadar hasar vermesini sağlar. Dost birim, etki tetiklendiğinde bu etkinin 1 birikimini kaybeder.
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmişse{/g} bir düşman {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}yem{/g} etkisindeki bir dost birime saldırdığında bu etkinin her bir birikimi, siber kartalın saldırgana kendi silah hasarı kadar hasar vermesini sağlar. Dost birim, etki tetiklendiğinde bu etkinin 1 birikimini kaybeder.

Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmişse{/g} bir düşman {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}yem{/g} etkisindeki bir dost birime saldırdığında bu etkinin her bir birikimi, siber kartalın saldırgana kendi silah {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} kadar hasar vermesini sağlar. Dost birim, etki tetiklendiğinde bu etkinin 1 birikimini kaybeder.

languages.text: Quand un ennemi attaque un allié doté de l'effet {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Appât{/g}, chaque cumul de cet effet permet au cyber-aigle, s'il est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, d'infliger les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de son arme à l'assaillant. L'allié perd −1 cumul de cet effet chaque fois qu'il se déclenche.
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Quand un ennemi attaque un allié doté de l'effet {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Appât{/g}, chaque cumul de cet effet permet au cyber-aigle, s'il est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, d'infliger les dégâts de son arme à l'assaillant. L'allié perd −1 cumul de cet effet chaque fois qu'il se déclenche.

languages.text: Wenn der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufsteigt{/g} und ein Gegner einen Verbündeten mit dem Effekt {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Köder{/g} angreift, kann der Cyber-Adler mit jedem Stapel dieses Effekts seinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Waffenschaden{/g} bei dem Angreifer verursachen. Durch Auslösen des Effekts verliert der Verbündete -1 Stapel dieses Effekts.
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufsteigt{/g} und ein Gegner einen Verbündeten mit dem Effekt {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Köder{/g} angreift, kann der Cyber-Adler mit jedem Stapel dieses Effekts seinen Waffenschaden bei dem Angreifer verursachen. Durch Auslösen des Effekts verliert der Verbündete -1 Stapel dieses Effekts.

languages.text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、敵が{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}餌{/g}の効果の付いた味方を攻撃すると、この効果の各スタックにより、サイバーイーグルはその攻撃者に武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。効果が発動すると、味方はその効果のスタックが-1される。
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、敵が{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}餌{/g}の効果の付いた味方を攻撃すると、この効果の各スタックにより、サイバーイーグルはその攻撃者に武器ダメージを与える。効果が発動すると、味方はその効果のスタックが-1される。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、敵が{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}餌{/g}の効果の付いた味方を攻撃すると、この効果の各スタックにより、サイバーイーグルはその攻撃者に武器ダメージを与える。効果が発動すると、味方はその効果のスタックが-1される。

languages.text: Когда киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, всякий раз когда враг атакует союзника-{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманку{/g}, киберорел наносит этому врагу урон от оружия. При срабатывании союзник теряет 1 уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Когда киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, всякий раз когда враг атакует союзника-{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманку{/g}, киберорел наносит этому врагу урон от оружия. При срабатывании союзник теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

Когда киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, всякий раз когда враг атакует союзника-{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}приманку{/g}, киберорел наносит этому врагу урон от оружия. При срабатывании союзник теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

languages.text: 如果生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，则当敌人攻击拥有{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}诱饵{/g}状态的盟友时，每有一层层数，生化猎鹰都会对攻击者造成一次武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此效果触发后，该盟友失去1层“诱饵”层数。
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 如果生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，则当敌人攻击拥有{g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}诱饵{/g}状态的盟友时，每有一层层数，生化猎鹰都会对攻击者造成一次武器伤害。此效果触发后，该盟友失去1层“诱饵”层数。

languages.text: Si la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, cuando un enemigo ataca a un aliado con el efecto de {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}cebo{/g}, cada acumulación del efecto permite a la ciberáguila infligir su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de arma al atacante. Cuando el efecto se activa, el aliado pierde una acumulación del efecto.
languages.original_text: If the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, whenever an enemy attacks an ally with the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect, each stack of this effect allows the cyber-eagle to deal its weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the attacker. Once the effect is triggered, the ally loses −1 stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Si la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, cuando un enemigo ataca a un aliado con el efecto de {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}cebo{/g}, cada acumulación del efecto permite a la ciberáguila infligir su daño de arma al atacante. Cuando el efecto se activa, el aliado pierde una acumulación del efecto.
